sentences.en: Fish is inexpensive, easy to cook and very digestible.
sentences.cn: 鱼价格便宜，容易烹调，且味美可口。

sentences.en: For best results, pre - exercise meals should combine protein and easily digestible carbohydrates.
sentences.cn: 为获得最佳效果, 运动前餐应该联合蛋白质和容易消化的碳水化合物.

sentences.en: Highly digestible for quick absorption of energy and goodness.
sentences.cn: 高消化率能够使食物中的能量和养分被快速吸收.

sentences.en: Mother cooked easily digestible millet mash at noon.
sentences.cn: 妈妈中午做了容易消化的小米糊糊.

sentences.en: People want content delivered in familiar, easily understandable, and digestible formats - audio and video.
sentences.cn: 人们喜欢便于理解和消化,并且熟悉的信息形式 — 比如音频或视频.

sentences.en: Readily digestible carbohydrates ( such as lactose ) are essential to provide energy.
sentences.cn: 易消化碳水化合物 ( 乳糖 ) 是提供仔猪能量所必须的.

sentences.en: Self - digestible inventory model is totally difference from the model of traditional inventory.
sentences.cn: 具有自消化引擎的库存模型是与传统库存完全不同的库存模型.

sentences.en: Slow and careful cooking of meat makes it more digestible.
sentences.cn: 缓慢的、细心的烹调使肉易于消化.

sentences.en: Starch and starch hydrolysis products constitute most of the digestible carbohydrate in the human diet.
sentences.cn: 淀粉和淀粉水解产物占人们饮食中可消化吸收碳水化合物的绝大部分.

sentences.en: The book's aim was to make economic theory more digestible.
sentences.cn: 该书的目的是要让经济学理论更加简单易懂。

sentences.en: The fernery starch soup showed a good colour, delicate fragrance, nutritious, digestible, absorbent, convenient.
sentences.cn: 成品色泽淡黄, 清香爽口, 营养丰富, 易消化吸收, 食用方便.

sentences.en: Vegetable oil digestible and mineral oil is not.
sentences.cn: 植物油易消化而矿物油则不然.

sentences.en: Vegetable oil is digestible and mineral oil is not.
sentences.cn: 植物油易消化而矿物油则不行.

sentences.en: Vegetable oil is digestible and oil is not.
sentences.cn: 植物油易消化而矿物油“则”不行.

words.tran_cn: 做摘要者；助消化食品；汇编者；蒸炼器

trans.tran_cn: 易消化的，可摘要的，容易了解的
trans.tran_en: food that is digestible can be easily digested
